 // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the

 // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.
 var grNI = new GlideRecord(table);
 grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());
 grNI.addQuery('active','true');
 grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);
 grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');
 grNI.query();
 
 // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.
 // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and
 // short_description values for the NeedIt record.
 while(grNI.next()) {
 options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + " (" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + "): " + grNI.getValue('short_description') });
 }
 
 // Return the array
 return options;
